categories: Category:Articles with elements from unlicensed sources

nodes.text: The Ambassadorial Sector was a section of Coruscant's Senate District. 500 Republica was the large building in the sector. It contained Loijin Plaza.

The distirct was an rectangular area of 25 square kilmometers, located approximately 30 kilometers from the Senate building. Despite its impressive acreage, the Ambassadorial District housed a very minor part of the planetary delegations (about three hundred of them).
